name: Introduction to the Robot
description: Getting familiar with the platform and learning how to control the robot.

lessons.name: Sandbox
lessons.description: Introduction to the platform, listing all peripherals, describing what we will be working with, and outlining any restrictions on libraries and tag words.
lessons.template:
from lineRobot import Robot


robot = Robot()
print("Turning left")
robot.turn_left_angle(45)
print("Moving forward")
robot.move_forward_distance(20)
print("Turning right")
robot.turn_right()
print("Moving forward")
robot.move_forward_distance(20)
print("Turning right")
robot.turn_right()
print("Moving forward")
robot.move_forward_distance(20)
print("Turning right")
robot.turn_right()
print("Moving forward")
robot.move_forward_distance(20)

lessons.name: Test drive
lessons.description: Some introductory words on moving the robot forward using a library.

lessons.name: License to drive
lessons.description: Writing a simple program independently, similar to the previous lesson.

lessons.name: Short distance race
lessons.description: Using library functions to move a specific distance, both forward and backward.

lessons.name: Maneuvering
lessons.description: Turning right and left in place. Task: Read data from a file and write it to another.

lessons.name: Fruit Ninja
lessons.description: Writing a program with a sequence of commands to move along a trajectory depicted in the diagram.

name: Controlling LEDs
description: Basic arduino functions of working with GPIO using LEDs as examples.

lessons.name: Headlights
lessons.description: Understanding how LEDs work. Task: Turning on LEDs.

lessons.name: Robot's alarm
lessons.description: More about the digitalWrite() and pinMode() functions. Task: Blinking LEDs.

name: Controlling Motors
description: Studying robot kinematics. Writing functions. What are DC motors.

lessons.name: Differential drive
lessons.description: An introduction to the robot's kinematics. Task: Experiment with functions for moving the robot forward.

lessons.name: Movement Function
lessons.description: Writing functions in Arduino. Task: Write a function to rotate the robot.

lessons.name: Electric Motor
lessons.description: Basic principles of DC motors. Task: Move to a specific point on the map using only functions for controlling motors.

name: Line Sensor Introduction
description: Understanding how IR line sensors work and detecting black lines using the Octoliner sensor array.

lessons.name: Line Sensor and Black Line Detection
lessons.description: This lesson focuses on understanding how an Octoliner sensor detects black lines using IR sensors and implementing black line detection.

name: Programming Fundamentals
description: Essential programming concepts including variables, conditional statements, loops, and arrays for robot control.

lessons.name: MQTT Greeting of Variables
lessons.description: Declare variables of different types and broadcast them in a single MQTT status line.

lessons.name: Telemetry: Calculating Time
lessons.description: Compute mission travel time from distance and speed and format it as telemetry.

lessons.name: Sensor Log: List and Aggregates
lessons.description: Summarise a list of sensor readings by reporting the count, values, and average.

lessons.name: Working with Lists: Adding, Removing, and Measuring
lessons.description: Manipulate a mixed-type list and report its contents and length via MQTT.
